**What are you proposing or what is broken**
A clear and concise description of what the problem is.

**Expected Outcome**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

**Actual Behavior**
A clear and concise description of what is currently happening.

**Steps to reproduce bug**
Most important part of the whole thing. Instructions for another team member to follow to reproduce the bug.

**Visual Aids (screenshots, videos, text)**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request or bug fix.
